Class Hero

java.lang.Object
Character.Entity
Character.Hero
Direct Known Subclasses:
BloodyMage, CrimsonArcher, Legionnaire, RedBastion
public abstract class Hero extends Entity
Represents a player-controlled hero.

Extends Entity and adds class type, abilities, inventory management, leveling system and combat actions.
